Cargyv - Class in model.element.motion
 
Cargyv(int, int) - Constructor for class model.element.motion.Cargyv

Closed_Door - Class in model.element.motionless
 
Closed_Door() - Constructor for class model.element.motionless.Closed_Door
The Builder that give the position, the access path of the sprite, and the parameters of the Closed Door.
controller - package controller
Provides all classes for the controller component.
Controller - Class in controller
Controller is the class that transfer the informations from the view to the model The Controller needs some informations to know how the game elements are : An Element table to place the objects The objects of the Demons and there locations Lorann and his locations A score used in the view to show the progression The state of the door that changes in the game The movements of the Spell and its uses For all of that, the Controller needs also the instructions given by the player that can be RIGHT, LEFT, UP, DOWN, NOMOVE, SPACE.
Controller(IModel) - Constructor for class controller.Controller
Builder Controller A variable take the value of model.
ControllerFacade - Class in controller
The Class ControllerFacade provides a facade of the Controller component.
ControllerFacade(IView, IModel) - Constructor for class controller.ControllerFacade
Instantiates a new controller facade.
Crystal - Class in model.element.motionless
 
Crystal() - Constructor for class model.element.motionless.Crystal
The Builder that give the position, the access path of the sprite, and the parameters of the Crystal.
Crystal - Static variable in class model.element.motionless.Crystal
